channel.title: Radial fade?
channel.description:
hey...im not really sure what its called so thats why i couldnt search it on any graphics forum. But anyways, what i have here is a random sig for no reason. I want the render to fade around the edges so it doesnt look so square. Later im going to crop it so theres not all that excess crap all around, then resize it a little. so can anyone tell me how they would fade it?
[URL=http://img113.imageshack.us/my.php?image=dantekingblood2wf9ei.png][IMG]http://img113.imageshack.us/img113/705/dantekingblood2wf9ei.th.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: Radial fade?
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

nvm...i just cropped it down so the render is the edge of the sig
it looks pretty cool so...i dont really need it anymore, however, if anyone knows how to do this it might come in handy for me later

edit: yea i know its fricken huge...lol. The site i found it on is nice and they render big pics so no matter how you resize it, the quality is great
thanks for the help

Read full topic

item.title: Radial fade?
item.dc:creator: @KyleGut3 KyleGut3
item.description:
@KyleGut3 wrote:

thats a sig? looks more like a background due to its size lol.

Oh and here is what you do [Photoshop]

1) make a layer mask
2) select what you want in a circular marquee
3) Go to Select > Feather and adjust the settings to your likings
4) Then go Select > Inverse Selection
5) Fill in your selection with black to mask it

And there you go.

Read full topic
